channel.title: criticism on Jan Savage
channel.description: Recent content in criticism on Jan Savage

item.title: AR: Annraynd
item.description: In the AR (author review) series, of which this is a first post, I will be reviewing (criticizing) authors. My goal in this, is two-fold: to convince myself that I have saved time not reading an author’s works because of the inferior quality of their thoughts; and also, to engage in a debate of sorts with that author. Today, the victim of my incisive criticism is Ayn Rand (or more accurtately, Alissa Zinovievna Rosenbaum).
